resources.string: To calculate your cluster points, you first have to enter the total points that you scored then select the cluster group that you want i.e. Cluster 1, Cluster 11 e.t.c, then you can then fill in the grade you score corresponding to each cluster subject.
By creating an account you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

Group two Subjects \n
Biology \n
Physics \n
Chemistry and Biological Science (taken by blind candidates)

Group three Subjects \n
History and Government \n
Geography \n
Christian Religious Education \n
Islamic Religious Education \n
Hindu Religious Education

Group four Subjects \n
Home Science \n
Arts and Design \n
Agriculture \n
Computer Studies \n
Aviation

Group five Subjects \n
French \n
German \n
Arabic \n
music \n
Business Studies
For grading, candidates must take all the three compulsory subjects, at least two sciences, one humanities and at least one practical or technical subject
